languages.text: Чистки в рядах Арбитес не пощадили никого, кто хоть немного не соответствовал строгим требованиям Лекс Империалис. Оставшиеся, лучшие из лучших, уже не могли выполнять весь спектр обязанностей Арбитес и не успевали прибыть в каждое место, где требовался их неусыпный надзор. Никто из тысяч кандидатов, стремящихся пополнить ряды новых, безукоризненных служителей Лекс Империалис, не сумел пройти вступительные испытания. Со временем "Арбитес Коронус", как они стали себя называть, стали закрытым орденом законников, вершащих собственное правосудие. Смерть последнего поставила точку в истории ордена.

During the purges within the ranks of the Arbites, no one who fell even slightly short of the strict stipulations of the Lex Imperialis was spared. Those that remained, the best of the best, could no longer perform the entire spectrum of Arbites duties, being unable to arrive in time wherever their vigilance was required. Not one of the thousands of candidates seeking to replenish the ranks of the new and flawless servants of the Lex Imperialis managed to pass the entrance trials. Eventually, the Arbites Koronus, as it came to be called, became a closed order of lawmen that administered their own brand of justice. The order's history ended with the death of its last member.

traits.locale_text: The purges within the ranks of the Arbites spared no one who fell even slightly short of the strict stipulations of the Lex Imperialis. Those that remained, the best of the best, could no longer perform the entire spectrum of Arbites duties, being unable to arrive in time wherever their vigilance was required. None of the thousands of candidates seeking to replenish the ranks of the new and flawless servants of the Lex Imperialis managed to pass the entrance tests. Eventually, the Arbites Koronus, as it came to be called, became a closed order of lawmen that administered their own brand of justice. The order's history ended with the death of its last member.

Not one of the thousands of candidates seeking to replenish the ranks of the new and flawless servants of the Lex Imperialis managed to pass the entrance trials. languages.text: Während der Säuberungen in den Rängen der Arbites wurde niemand verschont, der auch nur im Geringsten gegen die strengen Vorschriften des Lex Imperia verstieß. Die Verbliebenen waren zwar die Besten der Besten, konnten aber nicht länger das gesamte Spektrum der Arbites-Pflichten abdecken, weil sie oft nicht rechtzeitig eintrafen, wenn ihre Wachsamkeit vonnöten war. Keiner der Tausenden von Kandidaten, die die Ränge der neuen und fehlerlosen Diener des Lex Imperia auffüllen wollten, bestand auch nur die Aufnahmeprüfung. Schließlich wurden die Arbites Koronus, wie sie genannt wurden, zu einem geschlossenen Orden von Gesetzeshütern, die ihre eigene Auslegung von Gerechtigkeit praktizierten. Die Geschichte dieses Ordens endete mit dem Tod seines letzten Mitglieds.
languages.original_text: During the purges within the ranks of the Arbites, no one who fell even slightly short of the strict stipulations of the Lex Imperialis was spared. Those that remained, the best of the best, could no longer perform the entire spectrum of Arbites duties, being unable to arrive in time wherever their vigilance was required. languages.text: Nul ne fut épargné par la purge de l'Arbites. Quiconque s'éloignait ne serait-ce que d'un cheveu des strictes stipulations de la Lex Imperialis était condamné, tant et si bien qu'à la fin ne restèrent que les meilleurs parmi les meilleurs. Mais même animés de la meilleure volonté du monde, ils étaient désormais trop peu pour pouvoir accomplir l'intégralité des tâches de l'Arbites et se trouvaient bien incapables d'arriver à temps là où leur vigilance était requise. Pas un seul des milliers de candidats qui postulèrent pour rejoindre les rangs des serviteurs de la Lex Imperialis ne parvint à réussir les épreuves d'admission. Finalement, ce qu'on finit par appeler l'Arbites Koronus devint un ordre impénétrable d'hommes de loi administrant leur propre version de la justice, et dont l'histoire s'acheva avec la mort de son dernier membre.
languages.original_text: During the purges within the ranks of the Arbites, no one who fell even slightly short of the strict stipulations of the Lex Imperialis was spared. Those that remained, the best of the best, could no longer perform the entire spectrum of Arbites duties, being unable to arrive in time wherever their vigilance was required. Not one of the thousands of candidates seeking to replenish the ranks of the new and flawless servants of the Lex Imperialis managed to pass the entrance trials. Eventually, the Arbites Koronus, as it came to be called, became a closed order of lawmen that administered their own brand of justice. The order's history ended with the death of its last member.

languages.text: 帝国法务部内部大清洗的过程中，凡是未能符合帝国律法严格规定的人，哪怕只有一丁点不合格，都遭到了处决。残留下来的精英成员人数不足，无法继续履行法务部的全部职责，也无法及时赶往需要调查的地点。尽管成千上万的候选人渴望为全新的法务部补充新鲜血液，成为帝国法典毫无瑕疵的忠仆，但却没有任何人能顺利通过入门试炼。到最后，科罗努斯扩区的法务部变成了仅由法务官构成的小圈子组织，依靠他们自己的方式执行正义。许多年后，随着最后一位成员离世，法务部也不复存在。
languages.original_text: During the purges within the ranks of the Arbites, no one who fell even slightly short of the strict stipulations of the Lex Imperialis was spared. Those that remained, the best of the best, could no longer perform the entire spectrum of Arbites duties, being unable to arrive in time wherever their vigilance was required. Not one of the thousands of candidates seeking to replenish the ranks of the new and flawless servants of the Lex Imperialis managed to pass the entrance trials. Eventually, the Arbites Koronus, as it came to be called, became a closed order of lawmen that administered their own brand of justice. The order's history ended with the death of its last member.

帝国法务部内部大清洗的过程中，凡是未能符合帝国律法严格规定的人，哪怕只有一丁点不合格，都遭到了处决。残留下来的精英成员人数不足，无法继续履行法务部的全部职责，也无法及时赶往需要调查的地点。尽管成千上万的候选人渴望为全新的法务部补充新鲜血液，成为帝国法典毫无瑕疵的忠仆，但却没有任何人能顺利通过入门测试。到最后，科罗努斯扩区的法务部变成了仅由法务官构成的小圈子组织，依靠他们自己的方式执行正义。许多年后，随着最后一位成员离世，法务部也不复存在。

languages.text: Durante las purgas en las filas del Arbites, no se perdonó a una sola persona que no cumpliera con las estrictas estipulaciones de la Lex Imperialis. Los supervivientes, los mejores de los mejores, ya no podían cumplir con todas las funciones del Arbites, incapaces de llegar a tiempo adonde se necesitaba su vigilancia. Ni uno de los miles de candidatos a aumentar las filas de los nuevos sirvientes impecables de la Lex Imperialis superó las pruebas de admisión. Finalmente, el Arbites Koronus, como se acabó conociendo, se convirtió en una orden hermética de agentes de la ley que administraba su propia justicia. Su historia acabó con la muerte de su último integrante.
languages.original_text: During the purges within the ranks of the Arbites, no one who fell even slightly short of the strict stipulations of the Lex Imperialis was spared. Those that remained, the best of the best, could no longer perform the entire spectrum of Arbites duties, being unable to arrive in time wherever their vigilance was required. Not one of the thousands of candidates seeking to replenish the ranks of the new and flawless servants of the Lex Imperialis managed to pass the entrance trials. Eventually, the Arbites Koronus, as it came to be called, became a closed order of lawmen that administered their own brand of justice. The order's history ended with the death of its last member.

traits.locale_text: Durante las purgas en las filas del Arbites, no se perdonó a una sola persona que no cumpliera con las estrictas estipulaciones de la Lex Imperialis. Los supervivientes, los mejores de los mejores, ya no podían cumplir con todas las funciones del Arbites, incapaces de llegar a tiempo adonde se necesitaba su vigilancia. Ni uno de los miles de candidatos a aumentar las filas de los nuevos sirvientes impecables de la Lex Imperialis superó las pruebas de admisión. Finalmente, el Arbites Koronus, como se acabó conociendo, se convirtió en una orden hermética de agentes de la ley que administraba su propia justicia. Su historia acabó con la muerte de su último integrante.

languages.text: 高等裁定局の隊列内での粛清の間、レックス・インペリアの厳格な規定にわずかでも満たなかった者は容赦なく処分された。残った者たち、すなわち最良の精鋭たちは、もはや高等裁定局のすべての任務を遂行できず、必要な場所に時間内に到着することができなかった。新たにレックス・インペリアの完璧な奉仕者として隊列を補充しようとする何千もの候補者のうち、入隊試験に合格した者は一人もいなかった。やがて「コロヌス高等裁定局」と呼ばれるようになったその組織は、独自の正義を執行する閉鎖的な法執行者の集団となった。その組織の歴史は最後の一人の死をもって幕を閉じた。
languages.original_text: During the purges within the ranks of the Arbites, no one who fell even slightly short of the strict stipulations of the Lex Imperialis was spared. Those that remained, the best of the best, could no longer perform the entire spectrum of Arbites duties, being unable to arrive in time wherever their vigilance was required. Not one of the thousands of candidates seeking to replenish the ranks of the new and flawless servants of the Lex Imperialis managed to pass the entrance trials. Eventually, the Arbites Koronus, as it came to be called, became a closed order of lawmen that administered their own brand of justice. The order's history ended with the death of its last member.

traits.locale_text: 高等裁定局の隊列内での粛清の間、レックス・インペリアの厳格な規定にわずかでも満たなかった者は容赦なく処分された。残った者たち、すなわち最良の精鋭たちは、もはや高等裁定局のすべての任務を遂行できず、必要な場所に時間内に到着することができなかった。新たにレックス・インペリアの完璧な奉仕者として隊列を補充しようとする何千もの候補者のうち、入隊試験に合格した者は一人もいなかった。やがて「コロヌス高等裁定局」と呼ばれるようになったその組織は、独自の正義を執行する閉鎖的な法執行者の集団となった。その組織の歴史は最後の一人の死をもって幕を閉じた。

languages.text: Arbites saflarındaki tasfiye süreci sırasında, Lex İmperialis'in katı şartlarından gıdım sapan hiç kimseye merhamet gösterilmedi. Geriye kalanlar, yani en iyilerin de iyileri; artık Arbites görevlerinin tamamına yetişememeye başladı, teyakkuzlarının gerekli olduğu her yere zamanında ulaşamaz hâle geldi. Lex İmperialis'in yeni ve kusursuz hizmetkârlarının saflarında yer edinmek isteyen binlerce adaydan hiçbiri giriş sınavlarını geçemedi. Nihayetinde artık yeni adıyla anıldığı şekliyle Arbites Koronus, kendi adalet anlayışlarını uygulayan dışarıya kapalı bir kanuncu grubuna dönüştü. Grup, son mensubunun ölümüyle tarihin tozlu sayfalarına karıştı.
languages.original_text: During the purges within the ranks of the Arbites, no one who fell even slightly short of the strict stipulations of the Lex Imperialis was spared. Those that remained, the best of the best, could no longer perform the entire spectrum of Arbites duties, being unable to arrive in time wherever their vigilance was required. Not one of the thousands of candidates seeking to replenish the ranks of the new and flawless servants of the Lex Imperialis managed to pass the entrance trials. Eventually, the Arbites Koronus, as it came to be called, became a closed order of lawmen that administered their own brand of justice. The order's history ended with the death of its last member.

traits.locale_text: Arbites saflarındaki tasfiye süreci sırasında, Lex Imperialis'in katı şartlarından gıdım sapan hiç kimseye merhamet gösterilmedi. Geriye kalanlar, en iyilerin de iyileri, artık Arbites görevlerinin tamamına yetişememeye başladı, teyakkuzlarının gerekli olduğu her yere zamanında ulaşamaz hâle geldi. Lex Imperialis'in yeni ve kusursuz hizmetkârlarının saflarında yer edinmek isteyen binlerce adaydan hiçbiri giriş sınavlarını geçemedi. Nihayetinde artık yeni adıyla anıldığı şekliyle Arbites Koronus, kendi adalet anlayışlarını uygulayan dışarıya kapalı bir kanuncu grubuna dönüştü. Grup, son üyesinin ölümüyle tarihin tozlu sayfalarına karıştı.
